name: Oni
evidence:
EMF Level 5 
Freezing Temperatures 
D.O.T.S. Projector
trait:
The Oni is more active than other ghosts, it does a lot of ghost events (it drains double the amount of sanity during events so watch your sanity!) 
 
The Oni prefers the physical form during ghost events. 
 
An Oni will **never do the airball event** (p.airball) 
 
Oni can be seen for longer periods when flickering during hunts.

Can Hunt at 50% Sanity.
ability: The Oni has no hidden abilities.
